# telemetry-ebay
Build &amp; Startup Telemetry

# Token
Create Token here

https://c3.corp.ebay.com/project/access_and_security/

### Format

base64_encoded_string = base64(API_Key_Id:API_Key_Secret)

http header

"Authorization": "Basic base64_encoded_string"

# Documentation

https://pages.github.corp.ebay.com/Pronto-ElasticSearch-As-A-Service/docs/user_guide/es_authentication.html

https://wiki.corp.ebay.com/pages/viewpage.action?spaceKey=GDI&title=1.+Onboarding#id-1.Onboarding-%22Authorization%22:%22Basicbase64_encoded_string%22Howtorotateapikey

https://wiki.corp.ebay.com/display/C3DEV/API+Key+V2+User+Guide#APIKeyV2UserGuide-KeyRotation
